ComicInfo.Summary:
A mysterious figure breaks into a Baltimore church and defeats a Magic Priest before gaining access to the Warrior Nun computer system. He next appears in New York - where Areala has just begun training a new group of Warrior Nuns.
The three covers are: regular, Commemorative, and Leather.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/warrior-nun-areala-1-the-hammer-and-the-holocaust-/4000-171544/

ComicInfo.Title: The Hammer and the Holocaust Part 1 of 3 "The Anvil"
